name: Edited Video
description: Represents a video that has been edited (e.g., transcription/caption changes) and is linked back to an original video.

originalVideoId.title: Original Video ID
originalVideoId.description: ID of the original video this edited version is based on.

status.title: Status
status.description: Processing status for this edited video.

editedBy.title: Edited By
editedBy.description: User ID of who edited and generated this version.

finalText.title: Final Text
finalText.description: The (edited) transcription text for this edited video version.

transcriptionWithTiming.title: Transcription With Timing
transcriptionWithTiming.description: The transcription text and timing information for captions (words array etc).

captionStyleOptions.title: Caption Style Options
captionStyleOptions.description: Caption styling as chosen by the user (font, color, etc).

originalVideoUrl.title: Original Video URL
originalVideoUrl.description: The URL of the original (un-edited) video.

videoWithoutCaptions.title: Video Without Captions
videoWithoutCaptions.description: URL or path to the video asset without any captions.

finalVideoUrl.title: Final Edited Video URL
finalVideoUrl.description: URL where the final, edited video with new captions can be found.

localVideoPath.title: Local Video Path
localVideoPath.description: Local file path for the processed video on server (if applicable).

error.title: Error
error.description: Error message or details if processing failed.

processed_at.title: processed At
processed_at.description: the time which the video was processed for transcription editing
